sentence.text: She was a wiry little person one would have expected to live on and on .
He was a small , wiry , fit-looking 70-year-old ; ` pure Filipino " , he said and his features certainly seemed geographically correct , midway between Malaysia and Japan .
The man in white is thin and wiry with flashing black eyes and black hair sticking out from under the cap , wild looking .
He was only small but he was wiry , with hard , knotty muscles .
His body was wiry and tanned and he had a thick crop of black curly hair which looked badly in need of cutting .
As a kid I was one of those little wiry lads with thin legs , and they all said , ` He 's puny , is that lad .
He was a wiry man with dark , curly hair , whose cavalry twill trousers and tweed jacket clashed with the pair of trainers on his feet .
He was shortish and wiry , had a straight thin moustache and I guessed he was anywhere between 40 and 45 .
Gray 's wiry body was twitching with animation ; his keen eyes searched Stephen 's face for signs of agreement .
Maybe forty , I judged , with regular features , no make-up and a slim wiry figure in shirt , sweater and jeans .
She regarded the man for a while ; the wiry frame and sharp shrewish expression , the startling white hair and eyes which , in a certain light , seemed more pink than brown .
Zimmerman , at six foot two with his lean and wiry frame had been worrying enough , but his companion was the proverbial brick shithouse .
The tough wiry little man said the words in a cheerful manner , still with the big smile on his face .
Behind the front door hovered a small and wiry man who appeared greatly agitated and whose polished bald head was flushed and sweating profusely in spite of the cold .
The door opened and a young priest came into the room , a wiry man of middle height .
A thin wiry woman , her name was Meg and not herself the full shilling .
Back at the hotel , the festival organiser , a wiry Scot dressed in a Superman outfit , accosted Rozanov .
A slim , wiry youth , he was one of the few who could claim a ` middle-class " upbringing .
The wiry psychologist shook his head , almost dislodging his embroidered skullcap in the process .
` There 's not very much of you , but you 're wiry , and you 're young .
